summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 44th Avenue South from Graham Street to Othello Street; by constructing wood curbs and gutters, and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9887 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
